abstract: New York City police say young man working in store BNC General Merchandise on Amsterdam Avenue was killed during what appears to be a robbery.
lead_paragraph: Officers responding to a 911 call arrived at BNC General Merchandise, on Amsterdam Avenue between 104th and West 105th Streets, to find a man with severe blunt force trauma to the head.

headline.main: Worker Is Killed During Attack at Upper West Side Shop
headline.print_headline: Worker Is Killed During Attack at Shop

snippet: Officers responding to a 911 call arrived at BNC General Merchandise, on Amsterdam Avenue between 104th and West 105th Streets, to find a man with severe blunt force trauma to the head.
